+ *

Important points to note: + *

    + *
  • Avoid inserting {@link Node} instances directly into the {@code ComboBox} items list or its data model.
    • + *

    • + *
  • Avoid creating new {@link Node}s in the {@code updateItem} method of + * a custom {@link #cellFactoryProperty() cell factory}.
    • + *
+ *
